name: @stellar-expert/refractor-ui
author: team@stellar.expert
description: Refractor - pending transactions storage and multisig aggregator for Stellar Network

scripts.build: pnpm run build-ui && pnpm run build-api-docs
scripts.build-api-docs: pnpm dlx redoc-cli@0.13.20 build open-api/openapi.yml -t open-api/openapi-template.hbs -o public/openapi.html --options.disableSearch --options.hideDownloadButton --options.hideLoading --options.expandSingleSchemaField --options.onlyRequiredInSamples --options.theme.colors.primary.main=#0691B7 --options.theme.typography.fontFamily=ClearSans --options.theme.typography.headings.fontFamily=RobotoCondensed --options.theme.typography.code.fontFamily="Consolas, 'Liberation Mono', Menlo, Courier, monospace" --options.theme.typography.headings.fontWeight=300 --options.theme.typography.fontWeightRegular=300 --options.theme.typography.fontSize=16px --options.theme.logo.maxHeight=100px --options.theme.logo.gutter=8px --options.theme.spacing.sectionVertical=24px --options.theme.typography.headings.lineHeight=1.3em --options.theme.typography.menu.level1Items.textTransform=uppercase
